songs.title: Tell Me Bitch
songs.lyrics:
[Intro]
Why will you not just tell me you want me, biatch? (Whoa)
(Tell me, tell me, tell me) Why will you not just tell me?
Why will you not? (Just tell me) Just tell me (come on)
Just tell me, say it

[Verse 1]
Why will you not just tell you love me, bitch?
Why won't you just tell me?
Too scared to come and give me a kiss?
Even though you think I'm lovely
Why will you not just tell me you love me, baby?
I can tell you love me
Come over here, whisper it in my ear
That's all I wanna hear

[Chorus]
Tell me that you love me
Tell me, come on, say it
Say it, say you love me
Tell me, I love you
Tell me (Just tell me)
Tell me, tell me, just tell me
Tell me, just tell me, say it

[Verse 2]
Baby, if you don't just tell me you love me
There are gonna be some consequences
I'm gonna leave you out in the cold
You're gonna get dismissed
I see it your eyes, I can see that you want me
I can tell your body's achin'
So put your big man hands all over my pants
Only under one circumstance (Ya gotta)

[Chorus]
Tell me that you love me
Tell me, come on, say it
Say it, say you love me
Tell me, I love you

[Verse 3]
Baby, do you know that I can read what you're thinkin'?
And you know I'm kinda crazy, so baby
I can see you almost got a twitch too
Seems I got an itch too
Hear it fallin' off your lips, yeah
So maybe it's a power trip, but
I can see I got you mesmerized
Just like you've just been hypnotized
You're droolin out your fingers, out your toes
Wanna get under my clothes? (Well, ya' gotta)

[Chorus]
Tell me that you love me
Tell me, come on, say it
Say it, say you love me
Tell me, you gotta scream and tell 'em
That you know you love me
Tell me (tell me) that you love me
Tell me, come on, say it
Say it (say it) say you love me
Tell me (tell me) I love you

[Outro]
Tell me, tell me (Tell me)
Tell me, tell me (Tell me)
Tell me, tell me, just, tell me
Tell me (Tell me)
Tell me, tell me just, tell me
Tell me, say it
